summary: A poem about the poetic pursuit that in a harmonious way longs for death to occur. Life's desires and worries have done much harm to the poetic self and the person sees death as a help to loosen a large weight from their shoulders.
cast: Göran Cederberg|Ylva Edlund|Majlis Granlund|Elmer Green|Carl-Axel Heiknert|Dick Idman|Lilga Kovanko|Jaakko Kytömaa|Tomas Laustiola|Lena Linden|Pirkko Nurmi|Ivar Rosenblad|Aila Svedberg|Lars Svedberg|Maj-Len Thomassen|Gustav Wiklund
title: Landet som icke är
